title: Hodgepodge, miscellaneous, remnants. leavings (Eclipse)
description:
The ECUP wakes up with a mouth full of face and a receipt for the wrong kind of Bath Salts, with Eclipse Odds and Ends!

The Eclipse Comics Upload Project begins to wind down, leaving me with bits and pieces that just don't fit anywhere else. One-offs, graphic novels, collections, trading cards(!) - that sort of thing. So I plopped them into a folder called 'Odds and Ends', and here we are. Too many items to list completely, so here's some highlights:

Blandman (a parody of Sandman)
Brought to Light - Alan Moore and Bill Sienkiewicz team up for a history of CIA shenanigans
Floyd Farland: Citizen of the Future - early Chris Ware effort
Hembeck: The Best of Dateline - remember him?
House of Usher - adapted by Richard Corben
Pigeons from Hell - Scott Hampton covers Robert E. Howard
Real Love - Best of Simon & Kirby Romance Comics 40s-50 - nuff said
Allan W. Eckert's Tecumseh! - with beautiful Timothy Truman art
The Hobbit - adapted by Charles Dixon with painted David Wenzel art
The Price - a Metamorphosis Odyssey book by Jim Starlin
True Crime Trading Cards Series 002 - Serial Killers & Mass Murderers - awwwww yeah

AND SO MUCH MORE!!!

Seriously, there's a lot more. Like, a metric shit-tonne maybe.

As usual, I would like to elucidate my undying gratitude to the creative teams and the scanners! Gather it, give it!



Your penumbral second chance for this upload is 'The Magic Flute' by P. Craig Russell! This three-volume adaptation of Mozart's opera was released in 1990 with your typical stunning Russell artwork. That wily veteran of the Torrent Wars, LeonardTSpock, RESTORED this and uploaded it a few months back, in July to be exact. Though you touch yourself FAR too often, and probably haven't called your Mom in forever, I will grant you access to it if you click below:
 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8668274/P_Craig_Russell_-_The_Magic_Flute_(Restored)" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8668274/P_Craig_Russell_-_The_Magic_Flute_(Restored)</a>

Now go do, that voodoo, that you do, so wellllllllllllllllll!
